projects.name: Trend analysis of COVID-19
projects.short: The aim of our project is to analyze the impact of COVID-19 on the United States as a country as well as determine how individual states have performed against COVID-19.

projects.name: Virtual Clinic
projects.short: Developed a hospital management system for hospitals to manage its doctors, patients, pharmacies and laboratories.

projects.name: Music generation Using Neural Networks
projects.short: Developed a lyrics generator using NLP technique in Python3 with the help of implementing a Markov chain model that can predict a sequence of new possible lyrics.

projects.short: The project aims to provide parking spaces for users who are trying to find a parking space for a short interval of time.
